articles.title: It’s official: Austin City Limits has permit to hold 2021 festival - KXAN.com
articles.description: On Tuesday, the city issued a permit for the event on Barton Springs Road through Oct. 10 at Zilker Park.
articles.content:
AUSTIN (KXAN) Just days before the first weekend of the 2021 Austin City Limits Festival is set to begin, the City of Austin has finally issued a permit for the event to be held.
